articles.title: Nuclear war alert: Russia 'moving weapons' to seized territory - urgent warning issued - Daily Express
articles.description: VLADIMIR PUTIN is preparing to move nuclear weapons to Crimea, Ukraine's defence minister has claimed in a development which would have grave implications for Europe.

articles.title: Bang and Olufsen’s latest speaker disappears into your bookshelf - The Verge
articles.description: Bang and Olufsen’s latest speaker is the Emerge, and it has a compact form-factor that should blend right in to most bookshelves. It’s releasing in select European markets from today, with a US release this Autumn.

articles.title: Ancient tools 'reveal clues about gendered roles in European farming societies' - The Irish News
articles.description: Analysis of 400 stone objects from graves across Europe showed men and women were equal contributors to their community, researchers said.
